My Expertise

I am a new graduate from The University of Iowa, with a Bachelor's in Computer Science. I have had experience in designing, developing and implementing software in a variety of programming languages for a large range of projects. My experience ranges from working professionally as a software engineer to conducting research in assistive technology as a scholar. I am an innovative, passionate and hardworking individual with exceptional logical and analytical skills. Furthermore, I am quick and eager to learn and work well both individually and in a team.

Projects

Automated LinkedIn Apply

  • Python
  • Selenium

During my job search, I came to a quick realization that I was spending a lot of time doing the same repetitve task; i.e. Choosing a job that fits me & applying for it. Hence, I decided to save me some time, and automate the process. And here we are! Over the period I intend to make it completely automated and more powerful by including a resume formatter to modify the user resume accordingly to pass the companies' ATS
